com.madrobot.ui

Class EdgeGlow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.madrobot.ui.EdgeGlow

  • public class EdgeGlow
extends Object
    This class performs the glow effect used at the edges of scrollable widgets.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public boolean draw(Canvas canvas)
        Draw into the provided canvas. Assumes that the canvas has been rotated accordingly and the size has been set. The effect will be drawn the full width of X=0 to X=width, emitting from Y=0 and extending to some factor < 1.f of height.
        Parameters:
        canvas - Canvas to draw into
        Returns:
        true if drawing should continue beyond this frame to continue the animation

      • finish

        public void finish()

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()

      • onAbsorb

        public void onAbsorb(int velocity)
        Call when the effect absorbs an impact at the given velocity.
        Parameters:
        velocity - Velocity at impact in pixels per second.

      • onPull

        public void onPull(float deltaDistance)
        Call when the object is pulled by the user.
        Parameters:
        deltaDistance - Change in distance since the last call

      • onRelease

        public void onRelease()
        Call when the object is released after being pulled.

      • setSize

        public void setSize(int width,
           int height)
